other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

description:
Date::Manip - Date manipulation routines Date::Manip is a series of
modules designed to make any common date/time operation easy to do.
Operations such as comparing two times, determining a date a given
amount of time from another, or parsing international times are all
easily done. It deals with time as it is used in the Gregorian calendar
(the one currently in use) with full support for time changes due to
daylight saving time.
name: perl-date-manip

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
